name: hehe
description:
this game is a 2d platform game. It is a game where the player escapes from red walls by using special powers.

a - right
d - left
space - jump
mause - abilities.

Once upon a time, there was a small sugar cube, onece they were playing a game with their friends, they were attacked by the tea monster! and the tea monster threw all sugar cubes into it, only our sugar survived (drink your tea without sugar)
